info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 4:58PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Klamath County through 530 PM PDT... At 456 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Crescent, or 13 miles southwest of La Pine, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Odell Lake, Crescent Lake, Crescent and Gilchrist. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.
